description.title: What is Text Diff Checker?
description.text: Text Diff Checker is a powerful online tool that allows you to compare two blocks of text and instantly spot the differences. It highlights added, removed, and modified lines, making it easy to track changes between versions of code, documents, or lists.

howTo.title: How to Use Text Diff Checker
steps: Paste the original text into the left panel
Paste the modified text into the right panel
The tool automatically compares the texts
Red indicates removed text, Green indicates added text

questions.q: Is my text sent to a server?
questions.a: No, all comparisons are performed entirely within your browser using JavaScript. Your text never leaves your device.
Yes, this tool is excellent for comparing code snippets, configuration files, or any other text-based content.

questions.q: Is there a limit on text length?
questions.a: There is no strict limit, but extremely large texts might slow down your browser slightly. It handles typical document sizes with ease.
